review: its been more than 7 years but still when i watch it, it makes me laugh, makes me emotional and gives a full entertainment.and yeah i am not happy with some of fighting scene but this film has a great story and the last scene is really so emotional.and it looks like real. at last, movie is movie. this movie has a happy end just like others but in real some traveler never come out from the darkness just like .. and you can look at salman khan too. he made mistake a long back and still suffering.

it's one of the best action movies of salman khan. the story is quite pleasant. the performances are also nice. songs are very good. 'teri meri'  is my most favorite. this movie gives us a message about loyalty and respect. in between, there is a lot of laughter. the climax is written very well. of course, it's a must watch.
